traits.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The erinyes's weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a hit (included in the attacks).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8 damage) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. The poison lasts until it is removed by the {@spell lesser restoration} spell or similar magic.
